TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit XPathItem extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 XQuery 1.0 和 XPath 2.0 数据模型中的项。

span.span: Represents an item in the XQuery 1.0 and XPath 2.0 Data Model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 项可以是节点或原子值。An item is either a node or an atomic value.

block.para:
从 类继承时，必须重写以下成员： ：When you inherit from the class, you must override the following members: : -

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数由派生类构造函数调用以初始化此类型中的状态。This constructor is called by derived class constructors to initialize state in this type.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsNode As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsNode { bool get(); };

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，获取一个值，该值指示项是否表示 XPath 节点或者原子值。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the item represents an XPath node or an atomic value.

value.span: 如果项表示 XPath 节点，则为 ；如果项表示原子值，则为 。

span.span: if the item represents an XPath node; if the item represents an atomic value.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property TypedValue As Object
public: abstract property System::Object ^ TypedValue { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，根据当前项的架构类型以最合适的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]类型的装箱对象的形式获取当前项。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the current item as a boxed object of the most appropriate [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type according to its schema type.

value.span: 以最合适的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 类型的装箱对象形式表示的当前项。

span.span: The current item as a boxed object of the most appropriate [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果项的值根据其指定的架构类型无效，则 属性的值等效于 属性的值。If the value of the item is not valid according to its specified schema type, the value of the property is equivalent to the value of the property. 有关 命名空间中的类型支持的详细信息，请参阅[System.web 类中的类型支持](/dotnet/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes)。For more information about type support in the namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](/dotnet/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes).

span.span: Type Support in the System.Xml Classes

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Value As String
public: abstract property System::String ^ Value { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，获取项的 值。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the value of the item.
The value of the item.

summary.span: 按照指定的类型返回该项的值。

span.span: Returns the item's value as the specified type.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object ValueAs(class System.Type returnType) cil managed
Public Overridable Function ValueAs (returnType As Type) As Object
abstract member ValueAs : Type -> obj override this.ValueAs : Type -> obj

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: The type to return the item value as.

summary.span: 按照指定的类型返回该项的值。

span.span: Returns the item's value as the specified type.

returns.span: 以所请求类型表示的项值。

span.span: The value of the item as the type requested.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在派生类中重写时， 方法尝试将项的值转换为指定的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] 类型。When overridden in a derived class, the method attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type specified.

exception.span: 项值的目标类型的格式不正确。

span.span: The item's value is not in the correct format for the target type.

exception.span: 试图进行的强制转换无效。

span.span: The attempted cast is not valid.

exception.span: 尝试进行的强制转换导致溢出。

span.span: The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
Type Support in the System.Xml Classes

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract object ValueAs (Type returnType, System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver nsResolver);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object ValueAs(class System.Type returnType, class System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver nsResolver) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function ValueAs (returnType As Type, nsResolver As IXmlNamespaceResolver) As Object
public: abstract System::Object ^ ValueAs(Type ^ returnType, System::Xml::IXmlNamespaceResolver ^ nsResolver);
abstract member ValueAs : Type * System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver -> obj

span.span: The type to return the item's value as.

param.name: nsResolver
param.span: 用于解析命名空间前缀的 对象。

span.span: The object used to resolve namespace prefixes.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，以指定用于解析命名空间前缀的 对象所指定的类型返回项值。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the item's value as the type specified using the object specified to resolve namespace prefixes.

returns.span: 以所请求类型表示的项值。

span.span: The value of the item as the type requested.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在派生类中重写时， 方法尝试将项的值转换为指定的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] 类型。When overridden in a derived class, the method attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type specified. 对象用于解析与类型转换相关的命名空间前缀。The object is used to resolve namespace prefixes related to type conversions. 例如，将 `xs:QName` 转换为 `xs:string`时。For example, when converting an `xs:QName` to an `xs:string`. 有关 命名空间中的类型支持的详细信息，请参阅[System.web 类中的类型支持](/dotnet/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes)。For more information about type support in the namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](/dotnet/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes).

exception.span: 项值的目标类型的格式不正确。

span.span: The item's value is not in the correct format for the target type.

exception.span: 试图进行的强制转换无效。

span.span: The attempted cast is not valid.

exception.span: 尝试进行的强制转换导致溢出。

span.span: The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
Type Support in the System.Xml Classes

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ValueAsBoolean As Boolean
public: abstract property bool ValueAsBoolean { bool get(); };

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，获取该项的 数据类型的值。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the item's value as a .

value.span: 该项的 数据类型的值。

span.span: The item's value as a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性根据用于转换项类型的 XPath 2.0 规则尝试将项的值转换为 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] 类型。The property attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type. 有关 命名空间中的类型支持的详细信息，请参阅[System.web 类中的类型支持](/dotnet/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes)。For more information about type support in the namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](/dotnet/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes).

exception.span: 该项值的 类型的格式不正确。

span.span: The item's value is not in the correct format for the type.

exception.span: 尝试到 的强制转换无效。

span.span: The attempted cast to is not valid.
Type Support in the System.Xml Classes

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，获取该项的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]类型。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type of the item.
The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type of the item.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在派生类中重写时， 属性获取该项的类型化值的 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 类型。When overridden in a derived class, the property gets the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type of the typed value of the item. 例如，默认情况下，类型 `xs:int` 的元素具有 。For example, an element of type `xs:int` would have a of by default. 但 可以是可以映射到 `xs:int`的有效类型之一，如 或 。However, the could be any one of the valid types that can be mapped to `xs:int`, such as or . 有关 命名空间中的类型支持的详细信息，请参阅[System.web 类中的类型支持](/dotnet/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes)。For more information about type support in the namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](/dotnet/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes).

para.span: 所有实施者都必须为每个项目提供 属性，即使它只 。

span.span: All implementers must provide a property for every item, even if it is only .
